name: Sonesta Los Angeles Airport LAX
address: 5985 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: This elegant hotel is situated conveniently close to Los Angeles International Airport. The property is located within easy driving distance of the many attractions that this wonderful area has to offer. It appeals to business and leisure travellers, as well as those seeking a relaxing setting in which to unwind before or after a long flight. The hotel enjoys a charming design, exuding elegance and sophistication. The interior is beautifully designed, immersing visitors in refined decadence and splendour. Guests will appreciate the extensive choice of business, dining and leisure facilities that the complex has to offer. The rooms tempt visitors into a veritable lap of luxury. They are well equipped with modern amenities to offer comfort and a memorable stay.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: The Hollywood Roosevelt
description: Located in Los Angeles, a 3-minute walk from Dolby Theater, The Hollywood Roosevelt has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and organizing tours for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at The Hollywood Roosevelt have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking. There's an in-house bar and guests can also use the business area. Capitol Records Building is a 19-minute walk from The Hollywood Roosevelt, while Hollywood Bowl is 1.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: Hotel June West L.A., a Member of Design Hotels
description: The little sibling of the Proper Hotels, Hotel June is a beacon of creativity in L.A.’s Westside neighborhood. Set inside a mid-century modern building, the hotel has a breezy California sensibility brought to life by the visionary designers at Studio Collective. Warm woods and light blues recall the beach—just down the street—while quirky design elements and colorful Terrazzo add a playful punch. Rooms are serene and light-filled, with Aesop amenities, luxurious linens, and views of the beach and the Santa Monica mountains from some rooms. The buzzed-about rooftop restaurant draws guests and locals for poolside snacks, cocktails, and more elaborate dining affairs.Marriott

name: The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles
address: 404 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Set in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles radiates an elegance that has attracted U.S. Presidents, dignitaries, and beloved stars of TV and film. The hotel welcomes travelers visiting Southern California with a soaring atrium, world class amenities, and an unforgettable experience. Stay on top of your fitness in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and go for a swim in the newly renovated outdoor pool. Indulge in inspiring cuisine at our hotel restaurants including Lakeview Bistro and our award-winning LA Prime steakhouse. Recharge in our well-appointed, pet-friendly rooms and suites. Every room features our Heavenly® Beds, mini-refrigerators, HDTVs, large work desks, free Wi-Fi, and floor-to-ceiling windows with impressive city views. Suites offer separate living rooms, dining/meeting tables, wet bars, and marble bathrooms. With 166,553 sq. ft. of elevated indoor and outdoor venues, event planners can organize anything from lavish weddings to board meetings.Marriott

name: Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
description: The Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is a luxury urban resort hotel & spa featuring a rooftop pool, an outdoor garden patio and a trendy bar with craft cocktails, delicious bar bites and famous daily entertainment from Jazz to Salsa. Ideally located across of the street of L.A. largest shopping mall the Beverly Center, within 2mi of Rodeo Dr, Sunset Blvd, the Grove & the Academy Museum.accorhotels.com

name: W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills
description: W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills welcomes hotel guests to its urban retreat with personalized service, high-energy interiors and luxury amenities. Stay in the heart of Westwood, LA, steps from UCLA and the Medical Center and minutes from designer boutiques on Rodeo Drive, Santa Monica beaches and West LA museums. Our pet-friendly hotel include suites with cutting-edge technology, flatscreen TVs, mini-bars, mini-refrigerators and indulgent bedding. Business travelers will appreciate large desks and Wi-Fi access. Indulge in steaks as the DJ spins at STK Los Angeles, sample California cuisine by the pool or sip handcrafted cocktails at our Living Room Bar. Relax in our poolside cabanas, take a dip in the WET® outdoor pool or work out in the FIT® gym. Event planners will be wowed by spectacular indoor and outdoor venues, expertly supported by custom catering and state-of-the-art technology. Westwood, Beverly Hills and all of LA await when you book your hotel room at W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills.Marriott

name: The Westin Los Angeles Airport
address: 5400 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Situated four blocks from LAX airport, The Westin Los Angeles Airport offers you a haven of modern wellness. Recharge in dog-friendly hotel rooms and suites, each with refined comforts, signature bath products, spacious workspaces and plush Westin Heavenly Beds. Ignite your senses with delectable American fare, fine wines and innovative cocktails at our stylish hotel restaurant and bar after you explore nearby LA attractions like SoFi Stadium™, Hollywood Park, the Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach and the Kia Forum. Simplify travel with our long-term parking and free airport shuttle. Elevate your hotel experience with signature Westin facilities, such as the WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and RUNWESTIN™. Or ask about our unique Peloton Room package and Westin pet amenities. Plan elegant events near LAX in sophisticated hotel venues enhanced by expert planning and custom catering services. Relax in our outdoor heated pool or whirlpool and find a rejuvenating sanctuary at The Westin Los Angeles Airport.Marriott

name: Fairmont Century Plaza
address: 2025 Avenue Of The Stars, Los Angeles, CA 90067
description: Los Angeles' famed Century Plaza hotel has returned to center stage following a $2.5B renovation. The property has been completely reimagined with 400 expansive guest rooms featuring private terraces, 63 luxury residences, the 14,000 square-foot Fairmont Spa Century Plaza, Lumière - a French-inspired Brasserie, and 24,000 square-feet of private event space. Born on the former site of a 20th Century Studios backlot in 1966, the Century Plaza has always been at the center of where business meets Hollywood.accorhotels.com

name: The London West Hollywood At Beverly Hills
address: 1020 North San Vicente Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90069
description: Steps from Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive shopping, this boutique West Hollywood hotel features a rooftop with cabanas and a restaurant that serves a daily complimentary à la carte breakfast menu. Guests can also enjoy the fitness center and multiple dining options on-site. Featuring free WiFi, each air-conditioned suite at The London West Hollywood includes a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Standard suites include an open floor plan with plenty of living space and the hotel also offers 1 to 3-bedroom specialty suites. All suites provide mirrored closets and a vanity, a walk-in shower with 2 shower heads and a soak tub. Most suites also include a balcony with views. Many larger suites also boast completely separate seating areas with wet bars and walk-in closets. The property's complimentary breakfast includes pastries, bagels & lox, cheeses, charcuterie, yogurt parfaits, fresh juices, coffee & tea, cereals, and other seasonal varieties. Guests of The London can choose unique dining options. Boxwood at the London West Hollywood features California cuisine with a menu that includes seasonal, fresh local produce and small plates. The restaurant includes an elegant cocktail bar and an extensive wine list. The Rooftop features outdoor dining and a seasonal menu and serves lunch, dinner and brunch. The London West Hollywood also provides guests with a fitness center. The 24-hour facilities include cardio equipment, Life Fitness machines and an outdoor yoga area. Guests can also visit the on-site salon for hair styling, nail, & makeup services. Cabanas can be rented at the pool area and are equipped with mini-bars. Guests can order from the property bar as well. Beverly Hills and the Beverly Center Mall are 4 minutes’ drive away. The Hollywood Walk of Fame and Melrose Avenue shopping are just 10 minutes’ drive away. West Hollywood is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, restaurants, design and clothes shopping.

name: Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel
description: Experience the charm and tranquility of our newly redesigned boutique-style hotel by LAX Airport, providing a relaxing retreat for your stay. Our airport hotel in Los Angeles, with free shuttles and long-term parking, is near Manhattan Beach, SoFi Stadium, The Forum and much more. Relax in urban chic accommodations with plush bedding and deluxe amenities offering views of LAX. All our hotel rooms are dog friendly. Unwind in our trendy lobby or lounge with a signature cocktail and live tunes from local musicians with Evenings at Renaissance. Dig into authentic California cuisine at ICON, An LA Eatery, craft beers at Studio 12 Bar and Lounge, and our new illy Cafe for your morning coffee. Dip your toes in our outdoor pool or workout in our modern fitness center. Meetings, weddings and special celebrations are more than ordinary in our renovated event venues. We look forward to welcoming you into our cosmopolitan oasis, Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown
description: At Hotel Indigo® Los Angeles Downtown, you’ll experience the city’s thriving creativity, urban vibe and unique multiculturalism both inside and out. With convenient access to a variety of entertainment, dining and shopping options, including the iconic L.A. Live complex, Crypto.com Arena and The Arts & Jewelry District. Throughout the hotel, you’ll find décor with floral accents that recall La Fiesta de las Flores, an event that has showcased the city’s international melting pot since 1894. With neon lights that mirror world-famous L.A. nightlife, 18 Social features sweeping views of the dazzling lights that illuminate Los Angeles every night. In your room, cityscapes fill the walls, while our spa-style bathrooms were inspired by pre-Hollywood glamour and the jewelry that accessorized Golden Age cinema. No other hotel in Los Angeles provides such an immersive experience. Come and create YOUR LA Story.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Beverly Hills Marriott
address: 1150 South Beverly Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90035
description: The Beverly Hills Marriott is ready for its Hollywood closeup. In the Great Room, lighting creates inviting space to connect with free Wi-Fi and handcrafted cocktails. For a more exclusive experience, the Executive Lounge offers select guests a space to dine, work and recharge. At our restaurant, with bold art and playful patterns, classic American fare gets a California touch. A heated outdoor pool and chic lounge with fireplace take advantage of the city’s enviable weather, and a state-of-the-art fitness center caters to fitness trends with an array of equipment. Stylish guest rooms in our Beverly Hills hotel feature locally inspired art, platform bed, multi-use surfaces and updated bathroom with a granite countertop. Eight event spaces include the 300-capacity Del Rey Ballroom. Shop along Rodeo Drive, catch a show at the Hollywood Bowl or marvel at The Getty’s architecture.Marriott

name: Marina Del Rey Hotel
address: 13534 Bali Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: This hotel is located on the world's largest man-made boat harbor and features an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant. Los Angeles International Airport is 10 minutes' drive away. Free WiFi access and cable TV are available in rooms at Marina Del Rey Hotel. Other helpful amenities include an iron and a hairdryer. The on-site SALT Restaurant & Bar serves contemporary California cuisine for brunch, happy hour and dinner. Hotel Marina del Rey offers over 10,000 square feet of meeting and banquet space. An on-site business center, as well as the front desk, which is open 24 hours a day. It also offers a sundeck with a marina view and bike hires. Venice Beach is 2 miles from Marina del Rey Hotel. The Santa Monica Pier is 4.5 miles away.

name: Hotel Ziggy Los Angeles
address: 8462 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Located on the famous Sunset Strip, this boutique hotel offers the largest saltwater pool in West Hollywood and a 24-hour fitness center. All guest rooms feature WiFi. A flat-screen TV is included in each room. Bathrooms are equipped with a rain shower head and a hairdryer. Guests can utilize complimentary toiletries and an iron with ironing facilities. Our hotel offers a unique access to the West Hollywood fun. Soak up Hollywood Glam at it's best, this fashionable fixture on storied Sunset Boulevard exudes edgy, urban sophistication. Learn what makes us a place for a new generation of travelers seeking boutique touches and authentic experiences in the heart of West Hollywood. You will find a 24-hour front desk at this Hollywood hotel. Guests can enjoy shopping, restaurants and nightlife on Sunset Boulevard at iconic hot spots such as Katana, The Roxy, The Whiskey and the Viper Room. The Hollywood Walk of Fame is 3 miles from our property. Universal Studios Hollywood is 15 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: The Mosaic Hotel - Beverly Hills
address: 125 South Spalding Drive, Los Angeles, CA
description: Mosaic Hotel Los Angeles provides modern 4-star accommodation in Los Angeles. It also offers bicycle rental, a swimming pool and valet parking. The hotel has 49 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a variety of essential facilities to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. Mosaic Hotel Los Angeles's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and is a suitable place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has to offer. Los Angeles's well-known tourist spots are within close proximity to the hotel, with Rodeo Drive only a short walk away. The Los Angeles County Museum Of Art / LACMA and the Hollywood Walk of Fame can be easily reached by car.Revato

name: Le Parc at Melrose
address: 733 North West Knoll Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Discover an urban oasis and ultimate relaxation at this luxury boutique hotel, located in the heart of West Hollywood city center. Enjoy elegant amenities and state-of-the-art facilities, seconds from the action of the city. Le Parc at Melrose features numerous modern amenities and facilities. Guests can experience the beautiful city from the hotel's roof, equipped with tennis courts, a swimming pool and a sun deck. Accessible rooms are also available upon request. Only steps from Le Parc's front doors are many of the area's most famous attractions. Enjoy luxury shopping on Rodeo Drive, dine at legendary restaurants, or discover the vibrant nightlife of Santa Monica Boulevard.

name: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills
address: 465 South La Cienega Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90048
description: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills welcomes you with superb service, chic hotel accommodations and inspired amenities. Set the stage for your Los Angeles adventure with a sleek, modern design by Philippe Starck and a rooftop pool deck with stunning city views. Enjoy luxury creature comforts in our pet-friendly rooms and suites with custom-made furnishings and five-star amenities. Seven upscale suite categories offer a variety of layouts including some with outdoor terraces and balconies with city and garden views. Savor lingering sunsets over Beverly Hills while enjoying elevated dining at Vista Rooftop. Pamper yourself at the celestial Ciel Spa at SLS after taking a dip in the rooftop pool or working out in the 24/7 gym. Our indoor and outdoor venues can accommodate everything from grand outdoor weddings to private business dinners. Our five-star hotel is near Rodeo Drive, West Hollywood, the Hollywood Walk of Fame and many other notable Los Angeles and Beverly Hills attractions.Marriott

name: Silver Lake Pool & Inn
address: 4141 Santa Monica Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90026
description: Located in Los Angeles, 3.2 miles from Capitol Records Building, Silver Lake Pool & Inn has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel rooms contain a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at Silver Lake Pool & Inn. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Silver Lake Pool & Inn has a terrace. Griffith Observatory is 3.5 miles from the hotel, while Dodger Stadium is 3.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 11 miles from Silver Lake Pool & Inn.

name: W Hollywood
description: From start to finish, you'll be amazed by W Hollywood. Our hotel in Hollywood, CA, sits right on the lively streets of Hollywood Blvd and puts you at the center of top attractions like Hollywood Pantages Theatre, Hollywood Walk of Fame and the Capitol Records Building. With various eclectic event venues, West Hollywood will be the perfect backdrop for your next social gathering. You'll never have to wander far for good grub with our selection of American cuisine offered at Delphine Eatery and Station Hollywood - two of West Hollywood's finest restaurants in our hotel. The WET Deck is the ideal spot to make a splash in our rooftop pool after a workout in our hotel's fitness center. After an adventurous day, wind down in your hotel suite showcasing rich wood floors and fresh white linens accented with vibrant colors throughout the space. The views of the city lights from any part of our Hollywood Blvd hotel captivate the essence of W Hollywood.Marriott

name: Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles
description: Enjoy the Southern-California climate of the West San Fernando Valley. With friendly hospitality and affordable accommodations. Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles hotel offers top-tier service guests expect. Our Warner Center location offers access to all that Metropolitan Los Angeles has to offer. Shopping, restaurants, and businesses are all within walking distance. Hotel Features: 330 spacious guest rooms and suites. USB ports, In room safe, refrigerator, WiFi, 55 inch HDTV, coffee maker, and premium entertainment options. Stay fit with complimentary Fitness Center with treadmills with Satellite TV, bikes, and ellipticals. Our complimentary Business Center in the lobby is available 24-hours. Our sensational Runway Restaurant offers a casual atmosphere and the fresh flavors of its California cuisine, or enjoy our Lounge for a beverage or snack in a comfortable setting. Market Express, available 24 hours, has classic snacks and yummy sandwiches. We are within walking distance of many dining choices such as Morton's Steakhouse and premier shopping including Neiman Marcus and Nordstrom. The hotel has 17,000 square feet of divisible meeting space with an experienced catering staff to service your next meeting, banquet and social event. Please note that the capacity of the room may not reflect the catering service capacity. Reach out to us with any questions. You will find our hotel near major Los Angeles attractions including Universal Studios, The Getty Center, Malibu Beach and Hollywood. The hotel is just off the Ventura (101) Freeway within Warner Center in Woodland Hills, 25 miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles, California. We are also close to neighboring communities like West Lake Village, Van Nuys, Sherman Oaks, Thousand Oaks and Chatsworth. Welcome to the Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles hotel, we look forward to serving you!Hilton

name: Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills, a Member of Design Hotels
address: 9400 West Olympic Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90212
description: Quintessentially L.A; Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills sets the tone for hip repose with a boomerang-shaped pool surrounded by private cabanas—some with sweeping views of the city. Tucked in a secluded residential neighborhood adjacent to Beverly Hills’ world-class restaurants and shops, the hotel was built in 1949 and frequented by the likes of Marilyn Monroe. Thanks to contemporary style icon Kelly Wearstler, the 84 rooms and suites—many with kitchenettes or private patios—still blend Old Hollywood roots with a distinct 1950s vibe. A full-service wellness studio and Viviane Restaurant, under the helm of chef Michael Reed, round out a scene in which one experiences the casual “patio lifestyle” and laidback sophistication that is unique to Southern California.Marriott

name: Pendry West Hollywood
description: Located in Los Angeles, 2.5 miles from Dolby Theater, Pendry West Hollywood has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Pendry West Hollywood rooms come with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, American or vegetarian breakfast is served at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Pendry West Hollywood has a sun terrace. Petersen Automotive Museum is 3.1 miles from the hotel, while Capitol Records Building is 3.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 9.3 miles from Pendry West Hollywood.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Beverly Hills
description: Your luxury hotel in Beverly Hills. The AC Hotel Beverly Hills draws on its European Roots and Beverly Hills style to curate an elevated travel experience. Discover luxury in the heart of LA when you stay at one of the best hotels in Beverly Hills. Your hotel room reservation features pillow-top mattresses, luxury linens, mini-fridges, free Wi-Fi and smart TVs. Access our 24-hour AC Store and Fitness Center as well as ACE, our robot butler, is always on call to deliver sundries and snacks to your room. Spend your evenings at our AC Lounge with a craft beer or creative cocktails. Our Rooftop Patio has 360º views, showcasing the world-renowned Hollywood sign, or take a dip in our Rooftop Sunning Pool. Hotel room bookings located only two miles from Rodeo Drive, the city vibe is at our doorstop with the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Petersen Automotive Museums within a few short blocks. Whether you're here for business or leisure, let's get you a hotel room reservation today!Marriott

name: Los Angeles Premium 2br&2bt Suites With Free Parking
address: Santa Monica Blvd & Cole Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90038
description: Located in Los Angeles in the California region, with Capitol Records Building nearby, Los Angeles Premium 2BR&2BT Suites with Free Parking provides accommodations with free Wifi and free private parking. Featuring a terrace or a balcony, all units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer. A dishwasher and coffee machine are also featured. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible nearby and the condo hotel can arrange a car rental service. Dolby Theater is 1.5 miles from Los Angeles Premium 2BR&2BT Suites with Free Parking, while Hollywood Bowl is 2.2 miles away. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 8.1 miles from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Per La, Autograph Collection
address: 649 South Olive Street, Los Angeles, CA 90014
description: Located in the center of Downtown, Per LA is a hotel inspired by the building in which it’s housed. Originally the Bank of Italy, a historic 12-story building on the corner of Olive and 7th Street, the space is a symbol of inclusion and accomplishment. All rooms feature original artwork from a Paris-based design studio and are dressed in custom-designed furnishings and luxury linens. Many include standalone pedestal bathtubs and separate rooms for wash closets. Rooms also include desks, a fully stocked mini-bar, toiletries, and bathrobes. Guests can utilize the 24-hour fitness or lounge in the rooftop pool and bar. From the rooftop, guests can take in panoramic views of downtown Los Angeles or enjoy a cup of coffee from the outdoor cafe. There is a 24-hour front desk and valet parking at the property. The Grove is 6 mi from the hotel, while TCL Chinese Theater is 6.2 mi away. Walt Disney Concert Hall is 0.7 mi away. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 11 mi from the property.

name: Vagabond Inn Sylmar
description: This motel is 12 miles from Six Flags Magic Mountain Theme Park in Sylmar, California. All rooms include cable TV with extended channels and free WiFi. Laundry facilities is located on site. Each air-conditioned room at Vagabond Inn Sylmar features an private bathroom. All rooms boast vibrant décor and light wood furnishings. Around the clock reception is offered at Vagabond Inn Sylmar. Fax and photocopying services are available. Vending machines featuring snacks and drinks are located on site. Universal Studios Hollywood is 15 miles from this motel. Dodger Stadium, home of the Los Angeles Dodgers Major League baseball team, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Tommie Hollywood
address: 6516 West Selma Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90028
description: Located in Los Angeles, a 17-minute walk from Capitol Records Building, tommie Hollywood, part of Jdv by Hyatt provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the bar. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a city view. An American breakfast is available daily at tommie Hollywood, part of Jdv by Hyatt. With staff speaking English and Spanish, guidance is available at the reception. Dolby Theater is 1.6 miles from the accommodation, while Hollywood Bowl is 1.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 7.5 miles from tommie Hollywood, part of Jdv by Hyatt.

name: Kimpton Everly Hotel
description: Kimpton Everly Hotel offers a breath of fresh air among the swirl of hotels in Hollywood. Escape into highly interactive social spaces ranging from the light-filled Jane Q café and buzz-worthy Ever Bar, to a skyline heated pool with private cabana rentals and an outdoor lounge serving cocktails and light bites. When it’s time to retire, you’ll love the happy hues and mellow atmosphere of our guest rooms and suites, the thoughtful amenities that invite comfort and ease, and the fabulous views of the shimmering downtown skyline or the Hollywood Hills.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Amarano Burbank - Hollywood
description: A 15-minute walk from the Warner Brothers Studio, this contemporary Burbank hotel offers on-site dining and an outdoor swimming pool. All rooms include Wi-Fi and bottled water. The Hotel Amarano Burbank-Hollywood features comfortably furnished rooms with luxury linens, a bathrobe. A flat-screen TV with complimentary satellite and an iPod docking station are included. A continental breakfast is served every morning. The Greek Theater is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Hollywood, CA
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Hollywood hotel is set in a vibrant area near popular attractions and businesses. Our hotel is within walking distance of the Hollywood Walk of Fame, Pantages Theatre, Madame Tussauds Hollywood, TCL Chinese Theatre and Ripley's Believe it or Not! Odditorium. Bus and subway stations are located nearby allowing you to get around easily. There’s also an on-site underground parking garage for your convenience. Featuring modern interior design, our Hollywood hotel offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi, a microwave, mini-refrigerator and clean and fresh Hampton beds®. Other amenities include a work desk with an ergonomic chair, an alarm clock radio plus tea and coffee making facilities. Select one of our stylish suites for extra space, a separate living area with a wet bar. Start your day with a free hot breakfast – we serve a selection of hot and cold items and freshly baked waffles. Grab something tasty from the 24-hour convenience store or stop by the Front Desk for some insider tips on local restaurants and bars. Keep up your exercise routine in the fitness center, take a dip in the outdoor heated pool or rejuvenate in our spa. Our Los Angeles hotel also features a business center and 1000 sq. ft. of meeting space for up to 50 people. Catering options are also available.Hilton

name: Thompson Hollywood
description: A stay at Thompson Hollywood places you in the heart of Los Angeles, within a 15-minute walk of Hollywood Walk of Fame and Hollywood Palladium. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.Hotels.com

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Chatsworth
address: 20524 West Lassen Street, Los Angeles, CA 91311
description: Travel like you live at the Residence Inn by Marriott Chatsworth - San Fernando Valley's newest all-suite hotel. We are conveniently situated near highways 118, 405, 101 and minutes from CSU Northridge. Explore the great outdoors with the city's ample hiking trails, horseback riding areas, historical sites, and wildlife viewings. We are also near various film studios & some of LA's best sites. Our all-suite hotel has the comforts of home including a fully furnished kitchen which includes a cook top, dishwasher, cookware and dishware. Our spacious suites also include separate living, working and sleeping areas to help you create room for possibility. Kick back and socialize in our outdoor spaces which include fire pit seating to warm up and wind down or cook up a storm with our BBQ grill. Fuel your day with free breakfast - with a variety of healthy and hot options. Stay up to speed with our free Wi-Fi and smart TVs in every guest room, equipped with streaming apps. Make it yours at Residence Inn Chatsworth.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Marina del Rey
description: Connected to a Courtyard® hotel, the all-new Residence Inn Marina del Rey offers a unique experience in Marina del Rey, California. The fusion of these two signature Marriott® hotels allows you to take advantage of extra amenities like food & beverage options at Brizo Bar and Restaurant, Sam's Coffee Call and Terrace Deck; plus more event space to accommodate your needs. Set a pace that suits you at our hotel near Venice Beach attractions, businesses and activities. Whether you're in Marina del Rey for a few days, a few weeks or a few months, your daily routine matters. Spacious studios and one-bedroom hotel suites with separate living and sleeping areas offer a comfortable home away from home. A fully equipped kitchen makes dining in a snap, and complimentary Internet connects you to work and the outside world. Our complimentary hot breakfast starts mornings off right, and the hotel fitness center keeps you fit and active. Relax and stay focused and productive at Residence Inn Marina del Rey.Marriott

name: Sunset Marquis
address: 1200 Alta Loma Road, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Marquis Hotel Los Angeles is located in the heart of West Hollywood. Hidden away in a tree lined cul-de-sac, it is just steps from the famed sidewalks of the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The property features 2 outdoor pools and an on-site restaurant. Villas at the property include unique amenities like private elevators, kitchens,dining rooms, televisions, and living rooms. Suites include similar amenities with toiletries and Bluetooth enabled mobile speakers. There is an on-site bar available at the hotel. There is also a fitness center and spa available on-site. Guests can enjoy the gardens and 24-hour front desk. The property also is home to successful recording studios and an art gallery. The Sunset Strip is less than 0.6 mi from the property, while the Farmer's Market Los Angeles is 1.7 mi away. Dolby Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are 2.3 mi away. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Hilton Los Angeles Airport
address: 5711 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel offers the uncompromising accommodations and services of a luxury hotel. Our property is located just a quarter mile from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in sunny Los Angeles, California. Complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport is available 24-hours a day. The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel features comfortable elegance that appeals to all types of travelers. description: The Sunset Tower Hotel hotel is located in West Hollywood on the Sunset Strip, 2.5 mi from the Hollywood Walk of Fame. It features a rooftop pool that provides panoramic city views and a full-service spa. Spacious guest rooms offer free WiFi and floor-to-ceiling windows with views. The modern rooms at Sunset Tower Hotel offer flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, Nespresso coffee machines, & mini-bars.Nightly turndown service includes freshly baked cookies. Guests at The Sunset Tower Hotel can take advantage of the on-site fitness center and the reputable Joanna Vargas Spa. It offers a wide array of skincare and body treatments. The Tower Bar serves California cuisine with French and Italian influence. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city or enjoy the restaurant’s outdoor terrace. The poolside dining offers a more casual ambiance for the hotel’s guests. This hotel is 14 minutes' drive from the University of California-Los Angeles and 8 minutes' drive from Los Angeles Country Club. Downtown Los Angeles is 8.1 mi away.

name: Montrose at Beverly Hills
description: Montrose at Beverly Hills is located in a quiet West Hollywood neighborhood, just 0.5 mi from the famous Sunset Strip. The hotel offers a rooftop pool terrace with a pool, a tennis court, and cabanas. An on-site restaurant is also available. All rooms and suites at The Montrose feature an HDTV, a fireplace, a hairdryer, a refrigerator, and a fully stocked mini-bar. Most suites include a balcony and some offer a kitchenette. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Rooftop poolside dining is also available for those looking to eat a lighter meal outside. Other rooftop amenities include a full seasonal bar that overlooks Hollywood and a regulation-sized tennis court. Guests can also enjoy a welcome beverage, two complimentary bottles of welcome water, morning coffee & tea, and a fitness center. Notable venues such as Whiskey A Go Go, The Roxy Theater, & Soho House are within 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Rodeo Drive & Beverly Hills are 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: Kimpton La Peer Hotel
address: 627 La Peer Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Tucked into a sunny, tree-lined street, Kimpton La Peer Hotel delivers luxury in L.A.’s exclusive Design District. From the sculptural walls to a dramatic feather chandelier, the hotel evokes a quintessential West Hollywood style. Located in one of LA most walkable neighborhoods, near Beverly Hills, Kimpton La Peer Hotel features 105 guest rooms and suites, heated pool, more than 8,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space, and Mediterranean fare from one of LA's most well known chefs.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Peninsula Beverly Hills
address: 9882 South Santa Monica Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90212
description: Located in Beverly Hills, this hotel is 12 minutes' walk from shopping on Rodeo Drive. It features gourmet on-site dining options, a full-service spa and spacious guest rooms with flat-screen TVs. Cream colored rooms boast an iPod docking station at Beverly Hills The Peninsula. A refrigerator and mini-bar are available in all rooms. World-class dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner is available at the Belvedere restaurant. The Belvedere is a lively European Brasserie showcasing award-winning cuisine in a warm and inviting environment. The adjacent outdoor terrace space is a destination for al fresco dining under the glittering Beverly Hills evening sky. A large rooftop outdoor pool and a modern gym with personal coaches are available. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Upon check-in guests can enjoy free fresh fruit and a welcome beverage. Shoe shining services are available. The University of California Los Angeles is 2.5 mi from The Peninsula. Universal Studios is 8.3 mi away.

name: Palihotel Westwood Village
description: Set in an historic building, Palihotel Westwood Village is located in the Westwood area of Los Angeles, 2.2 mi from Getty Center and 6.6 mi from the Santa Monica Pier. A small refrigerator, fully stocked mini bar and free WiFi are provided in each guestroom. Additional amenities include a telephone, Bellino fine linens and a private bathroom stocked with Diptyque bathroom amenities. The property is air conditioned throughout, and the 24-hour front desk can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 8.7 mi from the accommodations. Melrose Avenue is 6.2 mi away. Rodeo Drive, UCLA and the Hammer Museum are 7 minutes or less from the property by car.

name: Downtown Los Angeles Proper Hotel, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Downtown L.A. Proper is housed in a landmark Curlett & Beelman Renaissance Revival building from the 1930's. Today its 148 rooms and suites, masterfully transformed by Kelly Wearstler, marry Mexican modernism with elements from France and Morocco, and original works by local artists. Two dining establishments are helmed by James Beard Award-winning chef Suzanne Goin and Caroline Styne, a split-level rooftop pool-deck offers panoramic views of the city, and 14,000 square feet of event spaces, including a suite fashioned from a vintage basketball court and another incorporating an indoor pool, make for memorable gatherings.Marriott

name: Moxy Downtown Los Angeles
address: 1260 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Reflecting the bold, adventurous spirit of California, Moxy Downtown Los Angeles is a haven for modern nomads in LA’s creative epicenter. Our location on Figueroa Street is steps away from the LA Convention Center and Crypto.com Arena, formerly Staples Center. Brought to life by an all-star team of architecture and interior design firms, the 380-room hotel channels the neighborhood’s forward-thinking energy and multicultural heritage. The hotel’s 12 dining and entertainment options include Level 8, a collection of restaurants, bars, and lounges that highlight DTLA’s diverse cultures and cuisines, and a rooftop bar on the 34th floor with views that sweep all the way to the Hollywood Hills. 4 outdoor terraces overlook the LA skyline, and flexible, tech-centric spaces foster co-working, meetings, and large social events. Floor-to-ceiling windows light up the smartly designed and affordable bedrooms, and a playful, cheeky attitude fuels the imagination.Marriott

name: Hotel Bel-Air - Dorchester Collection
address: 701 Stone Canyon Road, Los Angeles, CA 90077
description: No description found

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Los Downtown Los Angeles
address: 1260 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles places guests in the heart of downtown Los Angeles near LA Live and the LA Convention Center. Our hotel blends the AC brand’s timeless Spanish heritage with the artistic soul of Los Angeles, CA. Revel in artful designs from Yabu Pushelberg, who have created an elegant atelier for thinkers and doers. Find ample space and floor-to-ceiling windows in our 347 ethereal hotel rooms, which each provide a serene place to live, work, create and recharge. Visit a warm, light-filled bar and lounge or head on up to our hotel's 34th-floor rooftop garden with sweeping views of Los Angeles. Dial up the fun factor in DTLA, with 11 additional restaurants, bars and clubs, plus three outdoor terraces. It's all found just an elevator ride away at AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Hilton Los Angeles Culver City
address: 6161 West Centinela Avenue, Culver City, CA 90230-6306
description: Just off the 405, we are only 3 miles north of Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). Loyola Marymount University is just down the road. Check out Sony Pictures Entertainment and the Jurassic Museum of Technology, just 15 minutes away. Downtown LA is about 14 miles away, while popular spots like Venice Beach and Santa Monica Pier are just a 20-minute drive.Hilton

name: Chamberlain West Hollywood
description: Located in West Hollywood (Norma Triangle), Chamberlain West Hollywood is within a 10-minute walk of Sunset Strip and Whiskey a Go Go. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room.Hotels.com

name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
description: Established in 1975 on a palm-lined residential boulevard, L’Ermitage is a discreet, luxurious getaway located a stone’s throw from the beating heart of Beverly Hills. As the first all-suite hotel in the nation, L’Ermitage is committed to offering travelers 5-star service, excellence in hospitality, and spacious accommodations. Our 116 suites preserve the residential elegance of the hotel’s original design while providing guests with a range of spacious layouts and modern appointments. Inside, guests will find luxurious walk-through dressing rooms with ample wardrobe space, full-length triptych mirrors with warm adjustable lighting, and generous vanities that evoke a sense of old Hollywood glamor. We offer flexible check-in and check-out, and ask our guests to provide estimated arrival time so we can accomodate their arrival time request. L'Ermitage has a complimentary car service available to our guests daily in our BMW 5-Series in a 2 mile radius. The property offers charging stations for eco-friendly cars as well as two TESLA charging stations. Guests at the L'Ermitage Beverly Hills can use the modern fitness center or have a drink at the trendy Lounge. Brunch and dinner are served at the hotel's Avec Nous restaurant. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the University of California are within a short drive of L'Ermitage Beverly Hills. The Los Angeles Convention Center is also nearby.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Woodland Hills Los Angeles
address: 21110 West Oxnard Street, Los Angeles, CA 91367
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: LA Hotel Worker Protection Ordinance Fee. Our spacious pet-friendly suites are within one mile of Pierce College and Westfield Promenade mall. Topanga State Park is nine miles away and Universal Studios Hollywood is 16 miles. Enjoy our heated indoor pool or our restaurant, Toasted Barrel Woodland Hills. Our fitness center features a Peloton® Bike with toe cages. Valet parking only available.Hilton

name: Oceana Santa Monica, LXR Hotels & Resorts
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet: daily yoga classes: beach cruiser bike rental: special access to Peloton treadmills: luxury car transportation within 1 mile radius: 2 bottled waters daily: 2 beach towels: in-lobby premium coffee and tea selection.Hilton

name: Sonesta Select Los Angeles Torrance South Bay
description: This Torrance hotel is a 15 minutes’ drive to Manhattan Beach and Redondo Beach Pier. It offers an outdoor pool and sundeck, café and lounge, and newly renovated rooms with a refrigerator. Sonesta Select Los Angeles Torrance South Bay provides a coffee maker, lounge chair and a work desk in all rooms. Cable TV and Free Wi-Fi are also included. Los Angeles-South Bay Sonesta offers a gym and full-service business center. Guests can choose from a variety of food options and Starbucks coffee at The Commons at Sonesta Select or get drinks at the Lobby Lounge. Sonesta Select Los Angeles Torrance South Bay is a 10-minute drive to Los Angeles International Airport. The Long Beach Convention Center is 20 minutes away.

name: Andaz West Hollywood-a concept by Hyatt
address: 8401 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from the Sunset Strip, the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt features onsite dining and a rooftop pool. Rooms feature complimentary nonalcoholic beverages and snacks and free WiFi. A flat-screen TV and an electronics docking station are provided in each room at the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt. Free toiletries and bathrobes are also provided in the modern rooms. RH, the West Hollywood Andaz’s onsite restaurant. features seasonal California cuisine. The restaurant works to highlight “market to table” dishes. RH Bar is a chic evening space serving signature cocktails and appetizers. Guests can enjoy The Sundeck for poolside dining with fresh, light options. A business center and fitness center are available for guest use. The Beverly Plaza is 2 mi away from the hotel. Hollywood is 3.1 mi from the property.

name: Santa Monica Proper Hotel
description: Santa Monica Proper introduces a more laid back kind of luxury to Santa Monica. Here, within walking distance to the beach, each of the 267 guestrooms and spaces successfully harnesses the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design pays homage to the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper tempts guests with the only rooftop pool deck on the Westside, a singular vantage point for sunsets over the Pacific that includes a Balearic restaurant, bar, and cabanas, while the landmark Onda restaurant, marks a synergistic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. Taking Eastern-inspired wellness as a guide, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening in winter), presided over by internationally renowned Ayurvedic guru Martha Soffer, offers tailored holistic health programs. Anything less just wouldn't be Proper.Marriott

name: The Beverly Hilton
description: The Beverly Hilton, a Forbes four star hotel, combines the excitement of Old Hollywood with the unparalleled elegance of Beverly Hills. Nestled in the heart of the entertainment capital of the world, we offer our guests the opportunity to become fully immersed in the grandeur of this world-class city. From shopping to dining to entertainment opportunities in the Greater Los Angeles area, we offer our guests easy access to all that they could possibly ask for and more, including: Rodeo Drive - World-famous shops and boutiques, renowned for their exceptional high-end offerings and celebrity clientele. Santa Monica Pier - Extending out over the ocean in beautiful Santa Monica, the Pier offers rides, games, and entertainment fun for the whole family. 3rd Street Promenade - Outdoor shopping and dining exclusively for walkers and located a mere three blocks from Santa Monica’s beaches. Staples Center - The home of the Los Angeles Kings (NHL), the Los Angeles Clippers (NBA), and the Los Angeles Lakers. Grauman's Chinese Theater. The Grove - Outdoor shopping, dining, and entertainment venue: also the home of the Original Los Angeles Farmers' Market. Dodger Stadium, The Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, The Rose Bowl. J. Paul Getty Center - An architecturally stunning museum that rests high above Sunset Boulevard and houses collections by some of the world’s greatest artists. Griffith Park Observatory, Hollywood Sign, Universal Studios.The hotel features 569 luxuriously-appointed guest rooms and suites, each of which offers a unique perspective on this great city. All of our accommodations offer the finest in creature comforts, including: Plasma screen televisions, Bose Wave music systems, Lodgenet high-definition programming, L'Occitane bath amenities, European linens, Access to high-speed Internet and Wi-Fi.At the hotel, we appreciate that no two guests are alike. For that reason, we offer a wide variety of packages suited for all sorts of travelers: Bed and Breakfast, Beverly Hills Romance Package, American Girl Place, Aqua Star Pool Family Fun Package, Rest, Relax, & Rejuvenate Spa Package.We invite our guests to enjoy everything that our hotel has to offer, from dining opportunities to entertainment, and everything in between. We welcome everyone to enjoy casual dining suited for the entire family at CIRCA 55, and also to revel in the atmosphere of Trader Vic's Lounge - the acclaimed Polynesian restaurant and bar - famous for originating the world-famous Mai Tai. At The Beverly Hilton, there is something for everyone. Other hotel features include: The Lobby Lounge, Bar 210/ Plush - Beverly Hills' only lounge and ultra-lounge, Bar 210 offers an experience unlike any other in the Greater Los Angeles area. Aqua Star Spa, The Beverly Hilton Pool - An outdoor oasis, this is the largest heated pool in all of Beverly Hills. Fitness Center by Precor, Denis Bloch Fine Art. Le Chateau - A fine wine retailer specializing in California wines, guests may also schedule wine tasting events. Hours Minutes Seconds - A premier retailer of top-of-the-line timepieces. The Bellezza Salon, Accents Gift Shop, AVT Event Technologies and Business Center, 24-hour automated business center, Midway Car Rental. This hotel offers over 60,000 square feet of meeting space in 22 venues, each with its own distinct personality and atmosphere. Our Events and Catering teams are on-hand to ensure that every event surpasses our guests’ expectations. Our full meeting and event offerings include: Executive Meeting Center - Offering 11 breakout rooms opening onto a single corridor, the EMC allows for smooth transitions from meeting to meeting. It's ideal for groups of 100 or less. International Collection - A unique trio of spaces, the lobby-level International Collection accommodates from 50 to 1400 guests and an array of event functions - all the way to the most complex and media-intensive. Beverly Hills Collection - With 7 meeting spaces and 2 ballrooms.Hilton

name: Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo
address: 2000 East Mariposa Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Located within walking distance of Mariposa Los Angeles Metro Station, Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a free shuttle service. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms and a business centre. Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo provides 146 rooms, each with a refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and ample workspace. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close for a meal. Los Angeles International Airport is around a 10-minute car ride from Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo and El Segundo Los Angeles Metro Station is within walking distance. Those wishing to explore the area can also visit Los Angeles, located an easy drive from the property.HotelsCombined

name: Sheraton Universal Hotel
address: 333 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608
description: Find the AAA 4-diamond Sheraton Universal Hotel nestled beneath the Hollywood Hills, minutes from Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal City. Walk to the Red Line metro for easy access to attractions throughout Los Angeles, CA, including the Walk of Fame and TCL Chinese Theatre. Our hotel rooms pay homage to our Hollywood history with a sleek, minimalist ambiance. Recharge with Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience® beds, smart TVs and floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning views of Universal Studios, the San Fernando Valley or the Hollywood Hills. Start your day with breakfast at The California, then ride our free shuttle to Universal Studios Hollywood. After a day in the park, unwind beside our hotel pool or visit In the Mix, our on-site bar serving an extensive selection of drinks. Take in 270-degree views of Hollywood, CA, from the 20-foot windows in the rooftop Starview Room. Whether you're visiting California for a business trip or family vacation, Sheraton Universal Hotel welcomes you.Marriott

name: Casa Del Mar
description: This Santa Monica oceanfront hotel features 2 on-site restaurants and has a hydrotherapy spa tub in each room. It offers an outdoor pool and hot tub. 3rd Street Promenade is 5 minutes’ walk away. Some rooms include views of the ocean. A 42-inch flat-screen cable satellite TV is featured in each air-conditioned room at Casa Del Mar. Each elegant room is decorated in soft colors and features floor-to-ceiling glass windows. All of the pet-friendly rooms include a coffee maker, a mini-bar and ironing facilities. Offering a menu of fresh seafood and a daily raw bar, Catch is located at Casa Del Mar. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and features a weekend brunch with live music every Sunday afternoon. Small plates and nightly music are offered at The Terrazza, located in the hotel lobby. The restaurant provides guests with 180 degree views of the Pacific ocean and offers breakfast, lunch, and cocktails at night. Guests of Santa Monica Casa Del Mar can work out in the fitness room and private trainers are available. A business center with fax and photocopying services and a gift shop are located on site. Venice Beach is 15 minutes’ drive away from this hotel. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away.

name: The Garland
description: Close to Universal City, home of more than 50 shops and restaurants, this hotel in North Hollywood, California offers contemporary amenities such as free wireless internet and an on-site restaurant. An outdoor pool and hot tub is also available to guests. All rooms at The Garland include a private balcony, an LCD flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, and a coffee machine with coffees and teas. Guests at The Garland can work out in the fitness center. There is also an on-site bar available for guests. The Front Yard at The Garland serves Californian cuisine. Guests can also buy a cup of Seattle's Best Coffee at The Front Yard. In the evening, visitors can enjoy a drink on the outdoor patio at the Lobby Bar or the Lounge. Universal Studios Hollywood is 1.1 mi from The Garland, while the Hollywood Sign is 2.8 mi away. The Los Angeles Airport is 25 mi away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Santa Monica
description: Newly opened in 2017, Hampton Inn & Suites Santa Monica is just three blocks from the iconic Santa Monica Pier, perfectly located to enjoy a fun-filled day at the beach. The hotel is within walking distance of Downtown Santa Monica's best entertainment, dining and the world-famous alfresco shopping of the Third Street Promenade. We are located adjacent to the Metro Expo Line. Catch the Expo Light Rail for easy transportation to Los Angeles downtown Hollywood, just 7 miles away. After a busy day, enjoy our stylish second-story loft pool and deck, or retire to your spacious guest room or suite for a restful night's sleep. Our guest rooms are designed for the modern business traveler with energy-conserving LED lights, free WiFi and plenty of plugs to charge your devices. Relax and watch your favorite shows on a stunning 50-inch HDTV. For more space and upgraded amenities, choose one of our suites for a balcony, sitting area, wet bar and extra space to stretch out. Upgrade to a larger studio suite and enjoy a luxurious wrap-around patio and partial ocean views. Start the day off right with free hot breakfast served daily, Monday through Friday.Hilton

name: Beverly Wilshire, A Four Seasons Hotel
description: Beverly Wilshire, a 4 Seasons Hotel is located across the street from Rodeo Drive. The hotel features a Mediterranean-style pool and hot tub with private cabanas. The property is in a popular location to shop at Rodeo Drive, and is also in close proximity to areas such as Hollywood, Santa Monica, and Venice Beach. Rooms offer a flat-screen cable TV. Free WiFi for 1 device is available in all rooms at the hotel. A DVD player and an iPod docking station are offered and a mini-bar is included. Most rooms boast views of Rodeo Drive or the Hollywood Hills. Guests can relax in The Spa and enjoy massages, facials, and organic treatments using a wide range of products. A fitness center with state-of-the-art gym equipment is on site. Guests can enjoy complimentary fresh fruit, juice, bottled water, and pitchered water with natural fruit at the hotel. Meeting centers are also available. The pool offers cabanas at a surcharge and lunch dining is available at the poolside bar & cafe. Various dining options are available at the Beverly Wilshire. the CUT Lounge, a michelin star-rated steakhouse with a menu created by Wolfgang Puck, features seafood and steakhouse staples with cocktails and rare wines and spirits from around the world in a Mediterranean setting. THE Blvd, a mediterranean restaurant that offers outdoor seating overlooking Rodeo Drive. The Pool Bar and Café offers casual poolside dining, serving sandwiches, Paninis, salads, and desserts. In-room dining is also offered at the property. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art is 15 minutes’ drive from this hotel, while the Sunset Strip is 3 mi away. The Santa Monica Pier is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites
address: 2528 South Sepulveda Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90064-3123
description: The beautiful Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites is located in the heart of California. Literally minutes from Beverly Hills, the Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and UCLA you will truly see it all. Whether you are in town for business or pleasure the Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites has you covered with convenient amenities, an incredible location, and unbeatable prices. The stunning town of Santa Monica is minutes away from our perfectly located hotel. Experience the warm California surf at the Santa Monica State beach while getting your tan on. Visit Rodeo Drive and shop in style. While you are out be sure to visit some of the most unbelievable restaurants the entire country has to offer, ask our friendly front desk staff for great recommendations! Our Los Angeles hotel features suites with two televisions and a separate sitting room. Go ahead and make yourself at home. We offer 57 channels, all in HD. All rooms have a refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker, and safe. Valet parking on site! Don’t forget a full complimentary breakfast to sweeten the deal. Dig into a full breakfast of pancakes, endless cereal, yogurts, fresh fruits and stacks of sweet pastries, and get ready to start your day. Complete the meal with chilled juices and 100% Arabica coffee. If you need to burn off some of the extra breakfast calories we have an exercise facility and a refreshing outdoor swimming pool begging for you to dip your feet in. If you’re in town on business, we’ve got you covered. Regular guests at the Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites include employees of Fox Studios, Sony Studios, UCLA, the Federal Building, Sofi Stadium, Hollywood Park Casino and workers heading to the FBI Headquarters. We are also conveniently situated right down the street from the Metro Expo Line which will take you right to the Los Angeles Convention Center. No matter the reason for your visit we are positive you will be satisfied with our wonderful hotel. Book your spectacular stay with us. Pet rooms must be reserved if traveling with a pet. Limited number of pet rooms available.bestwestern.com

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport is located in the center of everything: the Bob Hope Airport, shopping, dining, and entertainment are all within minutes of the hotel. See one of your favorite game shows or late night talk shows in person. We are proud to have Disney, Universal Studios, NBC, CBS & Fox as our neighbors, in the heart of Burbank. Feel like seeing more? Visit Six Flags Magic Mountain, Disneyland, California Adventure Land or Knott’s Berry Farm Amusement parks for a thrill you and your family will be sure not to forget. Surf on over to the Santa Monica beach and Pier or cruise on over to the Venice Boardwalk for authentic street entertainment. If your into snowboarding or skiing Big Bear lake, Mountain High & Snow Summit are only hours away! Whether you're surfing the web or checking your e-mail, take advantage of our complimentary high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and lobby area to save you time and money. Our guest rooms come equipped with a large work desk equipped and an ergonomic chair and a data port for wired connectivity. Feel like relaxing on the bed and working? Our Cloud Nine bed does away with the old-fashioned bedspread, featuring instead a, white duvet cover, enveloping a lofty white comforter. The bed features four pillows providing consumers a choice in firmness (some filled with soft down, some with firmer foam), a lumbar pillow in a soothing color that provides guests back support if they choose to read, watch television or enjoy the Hampton lap desk and work wirelessly while resting in bed. Relax and unwind with an in-room movie or take advantage of our heated pool and spa. Working through the night and need a late night energy boost? Purchase a light snack or drink from our convenient suite shop located in lobby. And don't forget about the complimentary On the House hot breakfast in the morning. Our new utensils, made from 100% renewable resources, will help you reduce your carbon footprint, one step at a time, and feed your hunger all in a days work. In a hurry? Grab one of our On The Run Breakfast Bags with over 20 different items to start each day off right. Before you start your day, don't forget to grab a complimentary cup of coffee/tea or pick-up a copy of the latest USA Today in the lobby each morning. We also provide complimentary parking and shuttle service to the Burbank Airport. Every stay with the Hampton Inn & Suites Burbank Airport offers you additional points and miles for your travel, so sign up for your Hilton HHonors loyalty program today! Our unconditional 100% Hampton Guarantee ensures our travelers complete satisfaction. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you are not completely satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% HamptonHilton

name: Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills
description: Discover an alluring retreat at the newly re-energized and refreshed Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills. Our lush, resort-like escape is in the heart of the San Fernando Valley and just a short drive away from Hollywood, Los Angeles, Burbank and Simi Valley. After soaking up the sun at Malibu beaches and enjoying the area's premier attractions, find stylish and sophisticated amenities at our north Los Angeles hotel including select rooms and suites with access to our exclusive M Club Lounge. Our upscale accommodations feature plush bedding, 50-inch flat-panel HDTVs and private balconies showing off scenic views. To recharge, caffeinate at our full-service Starbucks Café. Whether you're exploring the vibrant area or taking advantage of our plentiful event space for your business or social soiree, seek a thrilling Golden State getaway at Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills.Marriott

name: Sixty Beverly Hills
description: Located in downtown Beverly Hills, California this 4-star hotel features a gourmet restaurant and outdoor rooftop pool and lounge with panoramic city views. The stylish rooms at SIXTY Beverly Hills feature dark hardwood floors and rich colors. French step-out balconies, 55” Flat Screen Smart TV’s with streaming capabilities, Nespresso machines, marble-clad bathrooms, luxury bath amenities, and terry bathrobes are offered in every room. Ella restaurant features flavors from all over the melting pot that is Los Angeles. Serving up local ingredients, Ella’s bold menu celebrates the Mediterranean, Asian, and Italian flavors found in our beloved city. And Ella doesn’t stop with delicious dishes. Paying homage to the history of the post-prohibition era, the cocktails showcase the rebirth of America’s greatest culinary contribution–the cocktail. Guests have free access to the state-of-the-art gym and rooftop pool. The 24-hour concierge desk can arrange various activities and car service is available. The University of California and Greystone Mansion are 2.5 mi from this boutique hotel. Luxury shopping along Rodeo Drive is less than 1 mi away.

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Los Angeles - Torrance Harborgate Way
description: This Extended Stay America - Los Angeles - Torrance Harbor Gateway is located in Torrance and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Los Angeles is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities, as well as upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily services are provided for a fee. Clean towels and linens can be exchanged at the front desk. The free grab-and-go breakfast includes breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea. The property offers free onsite parking. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Exxon Mobil, the Redondo Beach Pier and the Home Depot Center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Sherman Oaks
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California features 96 luxurious guest rooms and suites with all the amenities today's business and leisure travelers expect. The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California is located north of Los Angeles just off of freeways 405 and 101: 6 miles north of the Universal Studios Park. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California.Hilton

name: Courtyard by Marriott Marina del Rey
address: 4360 Via Marina, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Courtyard Marina del Rey is a bright, modern, new hotel located on the marina in the heart of Marina del Rey. Stay at our hotel to be near popular attractions like the Santa Monica Boardwalk, Venice Fishing Pier and Marina Beach. Our hotel is unique in that it is connected to a Residence Inn® hotel, allowing you to take advantage of extra amenities like guest laundry facilities, a larger fitness center and additional event space. Our state-of-the-art lobby provides greater flexibility and choices for hotel guests. At the center of it all is Brizo Bar & Restaurant, your destination for a great weekend brunch or drinks and dinner in the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces with free Wi-Fi where you can work or relax. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center and outdoor pool will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether visiting our hotel for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard Marina del Rey is sure to be more comfortable, more productive and more enjoyable than ever!Marriott

name: Mondrian Los Angeles
description: Located in the heart of the Sunset Strip, this West Hollywood hotel offers unique rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows. Guests can enjoy sweeping views of Los Angeles while enjoying a poolside cocktail at the famed Skybar. Mondrian Los Angeles in West Hollywood offers stylish guest rooms which offer breathtaking views of the surrounding areas from the LA skyline to the glittering Hollywood Hills. Enjoy a spa-like experience beneath a rainfall shower. Room amenities include flat-screen LCD HCTVs with full cable access, a mini-bar, fully equipped work areas and boutique bath products. Inspired by Sand and Sea, Casa Madera brings the Mayan Riviera to the Sunset Strip. Surrounded by sweeping views of Los Angeles, experience coastal Mexican cuisine paired with high-energy dining. The Los Angeles Mondrian offers an outdoor pool with underwater music. Guests can work out in the fitness center. A business center with fax and photocopying services is available. The Mondrian West Hollywood is located 1 mi away from Melrose Avenue. Rodeo Drive and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are within 2.8 mi away.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Marina del Rey
address: 4375 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Marina del Rey has the distinction of being the closest hotel to the water of any Ritz-Carlton hotel in the US. The hotel is elegantly situated on one of the largest recreational marinas in the world. There are 304 guest rooms and suites which feature luxurious amenities complemented with the legendary service of The Ritz-Carlton. Cast & Plow restaurant offers locally sourced and farm-fresh ingredients paired with craft cocktails and a revered wine list. Unwind at the heated saltwater waterfront pool and whirlpool. Activities include tennis, paddleball, SUP paddleboards, bicycling and skateboarding. Located less than five miles from Los Angeles International Airport and close to Venice Beach, Malibu and Santa Monica, visitors have easy access to the most popular attractions in Southern California including shopping, theatres, theme parks, studio tours, museums and beaches. The hotel is also 20 minutes from the 53-acre Porsche Experience Center which offers eight unique driving modules.Marriott

name: Shutters on the Beach
description: Located directly on the beach, this Santa Monica, California resort features 2 oceanfront restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. Providing luxury white linens, every room offers plush bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries at Shutters On The Beach. Styled in hardwood floors with a refined Tibetan rug, each room provides an iPod docking station and a 42-inch flat-screen TV. An in-room library is offered. Select rooms offer a balcony and select rooms offer spacious spa bathtubs. Boasting a panoramic ocean view and an oversize elegant white fireplace, One Pico offers seasonal cuisine on intimate tables with blue plush chairs. The beachfront café, Coast offers a casual atmosphere with a bar and lite bites. Featuring a heated terrace with an ocean view, the Living Room features afternoon tea, cocktails and a full menu of freshly prepared morsels. A poolside outdoor hot tub is offered. Valet parking is provided. A gift shop is also available at Sutter On the Beach Santa Monica. Santa Monica Pier is just 5 minutes’ walk down the beach. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away from Shutters On The Beach.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Torrance
description: Free Wireless High Speed Internet Access. Buffet Breakfast. Torrance Airport Nearby. 1 Mile from Del Amo Fashion Center. Across the street from 24 Hour Fitness Center, Shopping Center and Restaurants. Guest Laundry. Golf Course Nearby. 3 Miles from Redondo Beach Pier. Free Weekday USA Today. In room safes in all rooms at no charge. Outdoor Swimming Pool. Pet Friendly. Shanghai Palace Restaurant On Site. Guest rooms feature Sealy Posturepedic mattresses and new plush pillows. Incidental deposit is USD 100.00Wyndham

name: The Maybourne Beverly Hills
address: 225 North Canon Drive, Beverly Hills, CA 90210
description: This Beverly Hills hotel offers a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available and Frette bathrobes are provided. Crypto.Com Arena is a 20 minute drive away. A 42-inch flat-screen satellite TV is included in all guest rooms at The Maybourne Beverly Hills. All guestrooms provide guests with 24/7 access to all of the hotel's amenities and offerings. A seating area is also included and guests can enjoy slippers in the private bathroom. The Terrace, complete with a large outdoor dining patio overlooking Beverly Canon Gardens, serves California-inspired cuisine and guests can enjoy a cocktail at the Maybourne Bar. The on-site spa includes a sauna and a hot tub at no cost. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), the SoFi Stadium and the Hollywood Bowl are a 30 minute drive away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
address: 300 South Doheny Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90048
description: Located in the center of Los Angeles this luxurious, full-service hotel provides rooms with French doors opening to private balconies. This 5-star hotel features a full-service spa and outdoor pool. These air conditioned rooms at the Four Seasons Los Angeles at Beverly Hills offer views of the gardens, Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles or Beverly Hills. They are furnished with a living area and cable TV, a DVD player and iPod docking station. On-site dining provides guests with indoor or outdoor seating options and specializes in Italian cuisine. Cocktails are available at Windows Lounge located in the Four Seasons Los Angeles. Los Angeles Four Seasons at Beverly Hills features a library and gym. Guests can relax in the sauna or use the business center. Rodeo Drive and Melrose Avenue are within walking distance from the Four Seasons at Beverly Hills. Downtown Los Angeles is 11 mi away.
